name: Nekomancer (JathamTheGreat)
description:
You play as a nekomancer, a powerful magician that can summon cats at will (provided they have enough cat nip). The goal of the game is to destroy your enemie's base with your cats before they destroy yours with theirs. Your catnip counter regenerates immediately so it's merely a battle of atrition.

There are currently 3 cat types

  • Burmilla: a cat with high attack
  • Persian: a cat with high defense
  • Sphynx: a cat with high speed

I made this game in about 8 hours
